PErceptor/Perceptor's team::

"Follow me.." said the blind bot, Perceptor. Charon, Underground, 
Deepfear came in too, when Perceptor and Starscream's follower were 
far, Perceptor's team shot against entrace, closing it; after that, 
the moles used their fire-laucher again and the heat made that a 
group of rocks, made one that close the exit forever.

After that Charon, Underground and Deepfear ran where Perceptor and 
the others were. Perceptor used his comm link "Perceptor to Darkfate, 
Drillbit's troops are with us. Soon we shall be in the base, be 
ready."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Starscream/Bludgeon/Obsidian:::
> 
> ::Starscream, Bludgeon and Obsidian walked into the tunnel::
